nodes.text: Bufon Taire was a dark-skinned and scarred Human male who worked as the chief bartender of the Outlander Club. Taire color-coded his drink ingredients to help reduce the chance of accidentally including a mix that was toxic to a certain species, and watered-down his drinks to reduce costs.
In his bar, Taire was able to use the numerous color mixes and minerals like Aludium pu-36 and the popular Starshine special additive.
